descriptionHtml:
[color= gray][b]Description:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]Makes The Ningheim Race ADEC body compatible
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Notes:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]you will need The Ningheim Race for this to work
[*]this mod replaces some files from the original mod (body and textures)
[*]this is not a perfect patch because it has only one option regarding the skin options
[*]added optional download with version 3.0 of ADEC body
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Updates:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]v1.0 - initial release
[*]v1.1 - ADEC v3.0 body files added
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Glitches[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]none. at least for me
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Installation[/b][/color]
[list]
[color= gray][b]NMM[/b][/color]
[*]download, activate and when prompted overwrite
[color= gray][b]Manual[/b][/color]
[*]extract files to Data directory and overwrite
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Credits:[/b][/color]
The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35474/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D35474%26preview%3D&pUp=1] here [/url]

EyeCandy Body ADEC by Acdale[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390&navtag=file/images.php?id=5390&tab=3] here [/url]

Perfect neck seam by Radioragae[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7582/?] here [/url]
author: foooterman
